thread.title: Bruce: Louisiana dry spell set to continue
thread.title_full: Bruce: Louisiana dry spell set to continue - FOX 8 WVUE New Orleans News, Weather, Sports, Social

author: Written by: Bruce Katz
title: Bruce: Louisiana dry spell set to continue
text:
NEW ORLEANS (WVUE) - Some much welcomed rain could be on the way.
A large high over the southeast is blocking any Texas and gulf rains from spreading our way. This will be the case for the next 3 days.
Expect partly cloudy skies, overcast at times, with less than a 10 percent chance of rain. The pattern will shift late Sunday as the weather in Texas will pull our way with a cool front.
Rain chances ramp up late Sunday through Tuesday night.
Rain chances go away Wednesday as a stronger cold front moves through and dries us out.
Follow me on Twitter: @Bruce KatzFOX8
